short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to set, edit, and delete reminders for specific web pages. Notifications alert you when revisiting sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PageParrot enhances your browsing experience by allowing you to:

- Set, edit, and delete reminders directly on any webpage.

- A visual badge on the extension icon displays the number of active reminders when you visit or revisit a webpage.

- A Google Chrome notification will appear alongside the visual badge, showing the number of reminders.

For optimal use:

- Pin PageParrot to your toolbar so you're always just a click away from your tailored reminders.

- Enable Chrome notifications on your computer to receive pop-up alerts with the number of reminders, in addition to the visual badge on the extension icon.
